General.Name: Hana Technology Co. Ltd
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: Hana Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the development of precision automation solutions in the industrial field in South Korea. The company develops precise production and inspection automation solutions, which cover secondary battery automation facility, and glass processing technology and equipment. It also offers factory automation solutions. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Yongin-si, South Korea. Hana Technology Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Adtec Plasma Technology Co., Ltd.
